say_hello[source]

say_hello(to)

Say hello to somebody

{% endraw %}

Behold my markdown magic:

  1. asdf
  2. asdf
{% raw %} 
say_hello('omlnaut')

'Hello omlnaut!'
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
test_eq(say_hello('omlnaut'), 'Hello omlnaut!')
{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

class HelloSayer[source]

HelloSayer(to)

Class interface to say_hello

{% endraw %} {% raw %}

HelloSayer.say[source]

HelloSayer.say()

Do the saying

{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
o = HelloSayer('omlnaut')
o.say()

'Hello omlnaut!'
{% endraw %}
